meanings.definition: A person who repairs or restores something.
meanings.sent1: The menders fixed my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The skilled menders repaired the old clock.
meanings.sent3: The menders turned my ripped shirt into a masterpiece!
meanings.sent4: She was like a mender of hearts, fixing all that was broken.
meanings.sent5: The menders worked tirelessly to mend the torn fabric.

meanings.definition: The act of repairing or restoring something.
meanings.sent1: I appreciate the menders for their hard work.
meanings.sent2: The menders completed the restoration of the historic building.
meanings.sent3: The menders threw a party to celebrate fixing the roof.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was like magic, mending everything flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The menders' dedication shone through in every repair they made.
